Detailed Description

LogManager class definition.

This header defines the LogManager utility alogn with several macro and functiona that eases file management in TREX

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Definition in file LogManager.hh.

Define Documentation

#define LATEST_DIR   "latest" [related]

Name of the symbolic link to "latest" logs.

This macro gives the name to give to the symbolic link that will be created in the log directory to point to the logs of the latest/current session

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

#define LOG_DIR_ENV   "TREX_LOG_DIR" [related]

log directory environment variable

This macro gives the name of the environment variable to read for knowing in what path the log files should be placed.

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Definition at line 96 of file LogManager.hh.

#define MAX_LOG_ATTEMPT   1024 [related]

Maximum log directory creation attempts.

This macro indicates how much attempt to create a new log directory should be done before giving up and generating an error.

Note:
This value do not mean that TREX can only execute up to MAX_LOG_ATTEMPT missions in a single day. Ifndeed if one look at the code of LogManager::createLatest he will see that it makes this number of attempt stariung from the directory referred by LATEST_DIR link. Such behavior should really happen if the symbolic link LATEST_DIR is not set properly.
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Definition at line 122 of file LogManager.hh.

#define SEARCH_ENV   "TREX_PATH" [related]

Search path environment variable.

The name of the environment variable that indicates where TREX can search for files to locate them. The format fro this variable is a list of directories separated by a column (':')

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
See also:
LogManager::m_searchPath

Definition at line 86 of file LogManager.hh.

#define TREX_ENV   "TREX_HOME" [related]

Home environment variable.

The name of the environment variable that indicates where TREX is located. If valid, the value of this variable will be automatically added to the search path used by LogManager to locate new files

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
See also:
LogManager::m_searchPath

Definition at line 74 of file LogManager.hh.

#define TREX_LOG_FILE   "TREX.log" [related]

TREX default log file name.

This macro is used by LogManager. It gives the name of the log file to create for logging text messages.

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
